DOC.brief_summary: In vitro fertilization ( IVF ) assist reproductive technique achieve pregnancy subfertile couple average success rate 25 % . Mild ovarian stimulation treatment yield less oocyte , less adverse effect comparable clinical outcome compare conventional stimulation treatment . There high inter- intra person variability ovarian response fertility outcome parameter stimulation treatment little known explanatory variable herefore . Nutrition particular folate , synthetic derivative folic acid , B-vitamin widely asssociated reproductive outcome subfertility . Therefore , study aim investigate influence preconception nutrition folic acid use ovarian response mild/conventional stimulation treatment identify biomarkers follicular fluid indicate oocyte quality fertility outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Mild Versus Conventional Ovarian Stimulation Treatment In Vitro Fertilization
DOC.criteria: All couple indication IVF/ICSI treatment Erasmus Medical Center Prior oocyte donation Endometriosis Hydrosalpinx MESA/PESA Age > 37 BMI < 18 > 29kg/m2 Menstrual cycle disruption Indication Intra Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) Prior IVF treatment without embryo transplant History recurrent abortion Abnormal karyotype male/female Uterine abnormality
